MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 23-APR-2021 23:40.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut affecting the EH48 postcode area of Bathgate. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:33pm. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:28 PM on Friday, 23 April 2021.
